entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 40%
